summary:
I have built my company, Chamfer Management B.V., to help businesses transform their plans into a workable and fully integrated strategy and to ensure the successful implementation of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software.
 
I am an experienced freelance project management professional, specialised in ERP. I have a committed and focused approach to assignments and a proven track record of helping companies, including those with an international presence, to successfully implement complex, high-profile, multi-location ERP related projects in, amongst others, the Manufacturing, Production, Machine Building, Wholesale, Retail, Transportation, and Warehousing sectors. 

Whether it’s starting from scratch or giving new impetus to an existing portfolio, program or project, my start-to-finish approach consistently results in the successful execution of the required strategy. 

My key qualities: results-oriented, ethical, reliable, excellent self-control, and problem resolution skills.
 
Key professional qualifications: 
* Project management training: Agile Project Management, PRINCE2, Management of Portfolios, Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step, CPIM
* Business Applications: ERP (amongst others: Microsoft Dynamics 365 UO, -CE, -AX, -BC, -NAV, Oracle, InforLN), WMS, MES, PLM)
* International onsite experience: Belgium, China, Finland, Germany, the Netherlands, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom
* Member of the Dynamics Society (www.dynamicssociety.com)

Please check the website to learn about the mission, vision, values, business model, business strategy, value proposition, and conditions (www.chamfer.nl)
